name: Teen Wolf (Season 3)
summary:
Scott本是个正常人，但狼在他身上咬的那一口改变了他的一生。现在的他很想知道自己究竟是谁，他又会变成怎样。他的狼性会超过人性吗？或者反过来？反正不管怎么样，今后的路不好走就是了。Scott需要努力克制他的欲望，但是大多数时候他都感到很恐惧，他害怕自己体内潜藏的狼性终有一天会彻底控制他。哪些是Scott真正想要的东西，又有哪些是他忍不住想要的东西？《少狼》就讲述了Scott在这两者之间挣扎的故事。被狼咬的那一口究竟是上天赐予的礼物还是一个诅咒？它对于他和他怎么爱都爱不够的女孩——Allison之间的关系又意味着什么？他是否能够接纳他被赋予的新力量，还是会惧怕它们，看来只有时间才能给出答案。
　　（简介转自人人影视）

eps.name: Tattoo
eps.desc: Isaac wakes up with amnesia but is rescued by a mystery girl from the Alpha pack. Jackson has moved to London. Allison and her father have quit being werewolf hunters, and Scott is working on being a better person. Something eerie is causing the animals of Beacon Hills to go insane, and Dr. Deaton concludes that the animals are killing themselves intentionally. Derek gives Scott the tattoo he has been wanting to get, and explains to him about the Alpha pack and their leader, Deucalion, who is blind. For the past 4 months, Derek, Isaac and Peter have been looking for Boyd and Erica, who were captured by the Alpha pack.

eps.name: Chaos Rising
eps.desc: Stiles' childhood friend, Heather, is attacked and goes missing. The guys help Isaac recover his memory, and it is revealed that he had found Boyd and Erica and another female werewolf, all being kept in an abandoned bank vault, however, Erica may already have been killed. When Derek and Scott break in to save them, Derek recognizes the other female werewolf to be his little sister Cora, previously thought to be dead. Boyd and Cora, wild and bloodthirsty from the full moon, nearly kill Scott and Derek. Though a costly move, Allison, with no choice, saves them by setting the two wolves free. Angered by what Allison has done, Derek tells Scott to expose what Allison's mother tried to do to him before dying, which leaves Allison confused.

eps.name: Fireflies
eps.desc: Scott reveals the truth about Victoria's actions to Allison and Derek discovers Erica's body. Boyd and Cora (Derek's sister) are under the influence of the full moon and are on a rampage through Beacon Hills. After saving a group of kids from Boyd and saving a camper from Cora; Derek, Isaac, and Scott agree to go to Chris Argent for help. Meanwhile, Lydia finds herself driving to a public swimming pool without realizing it and finds a dead boy, which causes her to call Stiles for help, who discovers that the dead boy was a virgin. With Chris's and Allison's help, they are able to trap Boyd and Cora in the boiler room of the high school, but unknown to them, Ms. Blake is trapped with them as well. Derek risks his life to save her and manages to keep Boyd and Cora busy until the full moon is over. Stiles tells Scott that he has made a connection between the dead boy and Heather (Stiles childhood friend), concluding that someone is killing virgins for a sacrifice. Sheriff Stilinski later discovers a third dead virgin.
